content: Unsupported action. Please switch to the desktop mode to be able to edit PDFs or create PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when attempting to edit or create PDFs on mobile devices. It appears as an info toast notification and instructs users to switch to desktop mode to enable these actions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'work table mode' (iş masası rejimi) is not a common or accurate translation for 'desktop mode'. It's likely to confuse users. A better translation would be 'kompüter rejimi' or 'masaüstü rejimi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfən, PDF sənədlərini redaktə edə və ya PDF formaları yarada bilmək üçün kompüter rejiminə keçin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'εργασίας' (ergasias) in "Μεταβείτε στην κατάσταση εργασίας" doesn't accurately convey 'desktop mode'.  'Εργασίας' translates to 'work' or 'working' which is not the intended meaning. A more suitable translation for 'desktop mode' would be something like 'γραφείου' (grafiou - office) or 'υπολογιστή' (ypologisti - computer).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μεταβείτε στην κατάσταση γραφείου ή στην κατάσταση υπολογιστή για να μπορείτε να επεξεργαστείτε PDF ή να δημιουργήσετε φόρμες PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Cambie al modo de escritorio' is a literal translation of 'switch to the desktop mode'. A more natural Spanish phrasing would be something like 'Utilice el modo de escritorio' or 'Pase al modo de escritorio'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilice el modo de escritorio para poder editar archivos PDF o crear formularios PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses "tai" (or) which might be slightly less formal than necessary. A more formal alternative could be used depending on the overall tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more formal conjunction, potentially rephrasing to remove the direct 'or'. For example: 'Ole hyvä ja vaihda työpöytätilaan PDF-tiedostojen muokkaamiseksi tai PDF-lomakkeiden luomiseksi.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'PDF' is inconsistently capitalized. It's 'PDF' in the English and should be consistent in French. While common usage allows for lowercase, maintaining consistency with the source is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Action non prise en charge. Veuillez passer en mode desktop pour pouvoir éditer des PDF ou créer des formulaires PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a colon (:) after "Չաջակցվող գործողություն:" which is acceptable, but the subsequent sentence begins with a hyphen (-).  Consistency in punctuation would improve readability. Consider using a colon or simply starting the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the hyphen or change it to a colon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ການກະທຳແບບນີ້ຍັງບໍ່ຮອງຮັບ" is a literal translation of 'Unsupported action' which, while understandable, isn't the most natural phrasing in Lao. A more natural phrasing might be something like 'ການເຮັດແບບນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້' or 'ບໍ່ສາມາດປະຕິບັດງານນີ້ໄດ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນເປັນ 'ການເຮັດແບບນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້' ຫຼື 'ບໍ່ສາມາດປະຕິບັດງານນີ້ໄດ້'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຈະສາມາດ' while technically correct, creates an awkward sentence flow. It implies potentiality when certainty is intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນເປັນ 'ສາມາດ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'handeling' is not the best translation for 'action' in this context. 'Actie' would be more accurate and natural in Dutch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Niet-ondersteunde actie. Schakel over naar de desktopmodus om PDF's te bewerken of PDF formulieren te maken.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Włącz tryb pulpitu' is a literal translation of 'switch to the desktop mode'. A more natural Polish phrasing would be 'przejdź do trybu pulpitu' or 'przełącz się w tryb pulpitu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: przejdź do trybu pulpitu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Treceți la modul desktop" is a somewhat literal and slightly awkward translation of "switch to the desktop mode." A more natural Romanian phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vă rugăm să treceți în modul desktop

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙවැනි ක්‍රියාවලියකට අපි සහායෝගය කරන්නේ නෑ' (mevanai kriyavalekata api sahaayogaya karanne nae) translates to 'We do not support such a process'. While conveying a similar meaning, it's a bit too literal and informal. A more natural and professional translation would be closer to 'This action is not supported'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: හැකියාවක් නැහැ. (Hakiyawe nathe)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'PDF න්‍යාථා සංස්කරණය කිරීමටත්' (PDF n'yatha sanskarayanaya kirimata) is technically correct but sounds awkward. 'න්‍යාථා' is a bit too formal for a user-facing message. It translates to 'To edit PDF documents'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF ගොඩ සංස්කරණය කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'PDF ආකෘතීන් නිර්මාණය කිරීමටත්' (PDF akruteen nirmanaya kirimata) translates to 'To create PDF forms'. While accurate, it could be more concise.  'ආකෘතීන්' is a slightly formal term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF ආකෘති නිර්මාණය කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට හැරවිය යුතුයි' (parighanaka kriyakarithuwata harrayi yuktai) is complex and not the most natural way to express 'switch to desktop mode'.  It translates literally to 'must be turned over to the computer functionality'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට යා යුතුය. (Parighanaka kriyakarithuwata yayama) or පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට මාරුවන්න (Parighanaka kriyakarithuwata maruwanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Preklopite v namizni način' is a literal translation of 'Switch to desktop mode'. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like 'Preklopite na omizni način' or 'Uporabite namizno različico'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Preklopite na omizni način

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'različico' isn't explicitly present in the English. Adding it to maintain accuracy while adding clarity is helpful.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabite namizno različico

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Молимо Вас' is overly formal for this context. A more natural and friendly tone would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо или Пређите на

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'уређујете PDF-ове' could be improved for flow and naturalness.  The use of the plural 'PDF-ове' feels slightly clunky here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: уређујете PDF датотеке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Перемкніться' is a misspelling of 'Перейдіть'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Перейдіть

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Hành động không được hỗ trợ' is a literal translation of 'Unsupported action'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly phrasing might be 'Không hỗ trợ thao tác này' or 'Thao tác này không được hỗ trợ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thao tác này không được hỗ trợ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'chỉnh sửa tập tin PDF' is grammatically correct but 'chỉnh sửa PDF' is more common and concise in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: chỉnh sửa PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'tạo biểu mẫu PDF' is understandable, a more colloquial translation could be 'tạo mẫu PDF'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tạo mẫu PDF
